RootTreeWriter Documentation

v1.2.0

RootTreeWriter

This Package provides an Marlin processor to write a ROOT Tree with event variables. It provides a modular approach to extend the functionality. See the documentation of RootTreeWriter (Extending the RootTreeWriter) and RootWriteEngine for details.

For installation instructions, have a look here .
